Key Match Events: KL Rahul scored 9 runs off 14 deliveries
Lungi Ngidi dismissed KL Rahul and Rohit Sharma
Others: KL Rahul's poor form has been a concern for the team
Rahul's inability to rotate the strike and keep going at a good click has put immense pressure on the rest of the batters
Batting coach Vikram Rathour backed KL Rahul despite his poor form
Weather or Field Conditions: The match was played on a pace-rich Perth pitch
Historical Comparisons or Records: This was KL Rahul's third single-digit score in the T20 World Cup 2022 campaign
Notable head-to-head statistics: This was the second time Lungi Ngidi dismissed KL Rahul in the T20 World Cup 2022
